title: Maleficent

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Curse a player. Forcing them to sleep through the night.
- For 4 Malice, watch over another player, learning who they visit

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Mechanically, sleeping through the night is the same as a roleblock.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- Your target will not learn they they have been cursed.
- Watching over a player will give you their results as well.
- You may now kill players and have permanent Powerful defense.

desc:
Post 5422
*"Now go with a curse and serve me well!"*
